descriptor.name: Relishta Private Limited
descriptor.short_desc: Relishta is a native homegrown Indian brand born out of the ambition to deliver the best quality Tra...
descriptor.long_desc: Relishta is a native homegrown Indian brand born out of the ambition to deliver the best quality Traditional food from Uttar Predesh to the Globe. The company deals in ethically sourced Pickle, Juice, Healthy Sweets, Vinegar, Chips, Flours, Low Carb etc.

descriptor.name: Amada Pickle 250g by RELISHTA - Handcrafted original recipe & Traditional Taste
descriptor.short_desc: HANDCRAFTED IN SMALL BATCHES : Homemade, sundried, handcrafted, traditional taste, farm fresh, made in India. Our handmade pickles have the authentic taste of spices and ingredients we put in. Our sweet, sour and delicate pickles are a traditional heirloom family recipe. It is a much-loved traditional Indian side-dish that is easy to store and convenient to use. It is a delicious blend of spices with traditional spices. Our handmade pickles have the authentic taste of spices and ingredients we put in. Each of our variants is an ideal blend of iconic ingredients. Enjoy these pickles at the comfort of your home. STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS : Use a clean dry spoon and not a wet spoon as the pickles are natural. Please keep the lid tightly closed when not being used. If you live in an area that is humid, I would recommend refrigerating after opening. Our magic recipe creates wonders in the mouth and tastes best with all Indian meals,rice, daals, cheela, pakodi, poha and paranthas! Complementary pickle with every order.
descriptor.long_desc: Amada Pickle 250g by RELISHTA - Handcrafted original recipe & Traditional Taste

descriptor.name: Mustard Oil(900ml)Healthy -help reduce inflammation and pain
descriptor.short_desc: Mustard oil has about 60% monounsaturated fatty acids (42% erucic acid and 12% oleic acid); it has about 21% polyunsaturated fats (6% the omega-3 alpha-linolenic acid and 15% the omega-6 linoleic acid), and it has about 12% saturated fats.Pure mustard oil and mustard essential oil may help reduce inflammation and pain, slow cancer cell growth, block microbial growth, and enhance hair and skin health. Both can also be diluted with a carrier oil and applied topically in massage oils, face masks, and hair treatment

descriptor.name: Natural Sugarcane Vinegar  900 ml | Ahirori Annadata Farmer Producer Company Ltd | Raw, Unfiltered, Organic
descriptor.short_desc:
Experience the pure essence of traditional wellness with Natural Sugarcane Vinegar by Ahirori Annadata Farmer Producer Company Limited. Made from fresh sugarcane juice through natural fermentation, this 900 ml bottle offers a healthy alternative to synthetic vinegars.

Rich in nutrients and packed with natural goodness, our sugarcane vinegar is raw, unfiltered, and free from additives. Its mild sweet-tangy flavor makes it perfect for cooking, pickling, salad dressings, and health tonics. Known for aiding digestion, detoxification, and managing blood sugar levels, it supports your wellness journey the natural way.

Made from 100% natural sugarcane juice with no preservatives or synthetic acids, this vinegar supports digestion, metabolism, and detox. It is ideal for both culinary and health uses and is sustainably produced by dedicated Indian farmers, ensuring purity, tradition, and quality in every drop.
descriptor.long_desc: Natural Sugarcane Vinegar  900 ml | Ahirori Annadata Farmer Producer Company Ltd | Raw, Unfiltered, Organic
